channel.title: Primate Blog
channel.description: Primate - Expressive, minimal and extensible web framework

item.title: Release 0.26: Go Wasm routes, live reload, and HTMX extensions
Release 0.25: Native Deno support, I18N for Svelte/React/Solid
Release 0.23: Handlebars support, transactions, bundler code splitting
Release 0.22: Solid and Markdown support, build transformations
Release 0.21: More stores, error routes, liveview, `create primate`, and new website
